components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

fields.description:
h3. Feature request
It would be nice to have JSLint, or some other type of JS validator, to quickly run through the code and check for things like syntax errors. We can't have JSLint to tell us _all_ the recommendations, that would be overwhelming, but at least the major problems with the code, like Titanium Developer used to do.
fields.summary: Alloy - Add JSLint to the build process
